column4: How do I create this file without having a terminal or gui to start programs from? ctr + alt +dlt doesn't even work, though I can move my mouse and righ click on the taskbar. Should I just hard restart and go from there?
concerning Chrysalis, isn't there a DVD that has all the 'buntu's on it?
yea i think there is, though i dont have a dvd drive ;p
